sources.title: City Limits
sources.description: After falling from a train, a railroad magnate spends time as a hobo.

sources.title: City Limits (1934) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Frank Craven, Ray Walker, Sally Blane
Director: William Nigh

The wealthy president of a big railroad, meets up with a pair of hobos from whom he starts to learn how to really enjoy life in ways he never knew were possible.

metadata.Plot: The wealthy president of a big railroad, who's beginning to crumble under the combined pressure of business, personal and physical problems, meets up with a pair of hoboes from whom he starts to learn how to really enjoy life in ways he never knew were possible.
metadata.Actors: Frank Craven, Ray Walker, Sally Blane
